_header: Grant us faith mightful Father first in Trinity
Subjects: prayer, for gifts of the Holy Ghost; virtues, seven principal
_description: Prayer for the Seven Virtues — one stanza rhyme royal

Bod549.First Lines:
Graunt vs ffeyth myghtyfull ffader ferst in TruniteeGoddes sone
                    mercyfull wyth hope thow vs blesse…
Bod549.Last Lines:
…Graunt vs Strength gostly in all our AduersiteeAnd also
                    ȝeue vs Temperaunce in all our prosperitee
Bod549.Attributed Title: The vii vertues to the Trinitee (f. 78v)
